name: Commonwealth, to use, Appellant, v. Lombardo

judges: Before Maney, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth, to use, Appellant, v. Lombardo.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Hoban of the court below; costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Morley W. Balcer, Special Deputy Attorney General, with him T. McKeen Chidsey, Attorney General, and David R. Perry, Special Deputy Attorney General, for appellant.
James G-. Golleran, with him Joseph T. Kelly, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, to use, Appellant, v. Lombardo.
Argued April 14, 1947.
Before Maney, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Morley W. Balcer, Special Deputy Attorney General, with him T. McKeen Chidsey, Attorney General, and David R. Perry, Special Deputy Attorney General, for appellant.
James G-. Golleran, with him Joseph T. Kelly, for appellee.
May 7, 1947:
